name: SQuAD1.1
summary:
_âš  Use card with caution_
A reading comprehension dataset of over 100,000 crowd-sourced questions on Wikipedia articles, with answers as text spans from the corresponding passages.
notes: Primarily used for extractive QA evaluation with exact-match and F1 scoring. All answers are spans from the passage; no unanswerable questions are included in v1.1.
